PUMA 560 Simulation

Apr 7, 2015

#robotics

  • Download Code
  • Detailed Report

Download Code

Click here.

Detailed Report

Detailed report available as pdf file.

This project is to derive programs for simulation of inverse dynamics and control based on the model of PUMA 560 manipulator, with the last 3 joints neglected.
